pages.text: All of the gadgets in this mod require Forge Energy (FE) to do most of their functions. $(br2)Many mods add support for charging items with forge energy, but if you don't have any of them, theres always Charging Gadgets! Available at a mod repository near you!

A settings menu can be opened by holding the 'settings menu' key (default is 'g').  $(br2)Each gadget has different settings, so ensure you review the $(l:buildinggadgets2:mechanics)Mechanics$(/l) chapter for more details!
